title: Part Time Sports Content Researcher - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Part Time Sports Content Researcher Sports Media Posted/Updated: 10-20-2015 Brief Job Description: Responsibilities will include researching original content for full-screen graphics, anchor lead-ins, event support and original pieces, as well as creating and dispersing information...   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
